Posts.Content: jlellis wrote: My mom found a lump on her breast yesterday and went to the Doctors this morning.  She is scheduled for a mammogram for Tomorrow morning, she is seeing a surgeon Tuesday and getting a bone scan on Thursday.  I felt the lump and it feels like the size of an egg.  Does the larger the lump is mean the more likely she is to get cancer? She has also lost 30-40 lbs in the last 6 months.  Is this a negative symptom of bc? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Size Relation to Diagnosis? jlellis jlellis

Posts.Content: Sep 22, 2009 03:06PM jlellis wrote: We went to see the surgeon today and he said he is not overly concerned with the lump.  He does not think that the weight loss has anything to do with the lump on her breast! The journey isn't over yet, but we now have a bit of relief! Thank you for your kind words, they got me through the last couple of days!
Posts.Title: Size Relation to Diagnosis? jlellis jlellis
